aboutText.span1: Hi! I’m Jonatan Ljung — a web developer with just over two years of experience at INBooks. I'm currently looking for new opportunities where I can contribute with both technical skill and creative thinking, while continuing to grow in my career.
aboutText.span2: My background is in full-stack web development, with hands-on experience in Java, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. I’ve worked extensively with Angular and AngularJS to build user-friendly, dynamic applications. More recently, I’ve started diving into C# and Flutter to broaden my skill set and explore new areas of development.
aboutText.span3: I’m based in Växjö but open to roles across southern Sweden — or remote! I'm known for being creative, detail-oriented, and solution-focused, which led to me taking on additional responsibility for UI quality assurance in my previous role. That also meant close collaboration with designers, product owners, and business analysts, which I genuinely enjoyed.
aboutText.span4: If you're looking for someone with a mix of technical know-how, creativity, and a friendly team spirit — let’s talk!
